news_header: The Ento shareholders' Nomination Board proposes a Board of Directors with eight members, including re-elections and a new Chairman.
news_original_title: Veli-Matti Mattila nousemassa Enenton hallituksen puheenjohtajaksi
news_text: The Nomination Board of Ento suggests that the Board of Directors consist of eight members. They propose to re-elect Tiina Kuusisto, Erik Forsberg, Nora Kerppola, Markus Ehrnrooth, Veli-Matti Mattila, Petra Ålund, Paul Randall, and Kalle Alpine. Veli-Matti Mattila is nominated as the new Chairman. Current members Patrick Lapveteläinen, Minna Parhiala, and Martin Johansson will not seek re-election.
